text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Pheee～w! Bakushin on a day off is truly 
something special! 
I seem to have come all the way to the 
prefecture border without noticing…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmhm!? 
Running over there, my rival――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's the Shinkansen…! 
As expected, what a magnificent run!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…But I'm no slouch either! 
Allow me to show to you the fruits of my 
training!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hah… Haaaah… I never thought I'd… lose 
sight of it… A, and――

By the time she got back to Tracen 
Academy, even Sakura Bakushin O was 
exhausted…
